title: I need the SDS (or MSDS) for the battery in the pixel 4xl.
content:
I need confirmation that the battery in the Pixel 4xl is of a type that has passed the tests in the UN Manual of Tests & Criteria, Part III, subsection 38.3.  (This is a requirement for shipping any lithium battery, or any device containing a lithium battery.)  Often this confirmation can be found the in the Transportation section (usually Section 14) of an SDS (or MSDS).

I have already thoroughly looked through the Safety & Regulatory information for the Pixel 4 XL, and I see no reference to the UN Manual 38.3 testing, nor do I see any way to download or view the (M)SDS.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
